==Profile==
Nusta is a courier, meaning messenger. Based on her outfit, she is likely a member of the [[Flower-Feather Clan]].

==Trivia==

=== Etymology ===

* {{W|Ñusta}} is a term for a highly noble or upper-class woman of Inca or Andean birth.
